reviewText: Our local PBS television station here in Portland, Oregon USA is airing this series. We are absolutely captivated by "Frankie," and we admire the writing, the rich characterizations, and the marvelous acting. We just discovered that BBC canceled this series after only one season. We are appalled at the decision. Is there any hope of reviving this series?
Great Television Series, Love Eve Myles, has done TV and Movies,She has acted with the National Theatre and she comes from  Ystradgynlais, Wales
